creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
text:
On Windows 2000
JDK 1.4

fresh install

Trying to access tomcat Administration throws this error!!!!

fulfilling this request.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
The standard installation works. Please explain how to reproduce this (I suppose
Tomcat is incorrectly installed).

creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
text:
just download 

http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/test/v4.1.11/bin/jakarta-tomcat-4.1.11-LE-jdk14.tar.gz

Extract on C:\
cd jakarta-tomcat-4.1.11-LE-jdk14
edit conf\tomcat-users.xml and add admin role to tomcat user
start tomcat: bin\startup

On the same machine, start IE with the URL http://localhost:8080

Click on the Administration hyperlink and the error appears...

creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
text:
Same installation procedure on windows and linux.

On Linux -> all works fine
On Windows 2000 SP2 -> the bug is reproducible

So, should reopen the bug!!!!!

creator: amyroh@apache.org
text:
I tried both with jakarta-tomcat-4.1.11-LE-jdk14.zip and
jakarta-tomcat-4.1.11-LE-jdk14.exe on Windows 2000 and it works fine.

creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
text:
Just for the record...

I've tried jakarta-tomcat-4.1.11-LE-jdk14.zip and it works.
But jakarta-tomcat-4.1.11-LE-jdk14.tar.gz fails on Windows 2000.

I think binaries should be the same whatever the compression method used (zip or
tar.gz). But it seems it's not!!!

What's the diference between zip and tar.gz distribution??? ;-)
